name: shsel2i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, co(c2, cph, c1)))

stmt.origin: mp2an(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, co(c2, cph, c1))), wcel(c2, csh), wcel(c1, csh))
stmt.pretty: mp2an((c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈(c2[+H]c1)), c2 ∈ SH, c1 ∈ SH)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, co(c2, cph, c1)))
-| wcel(c2, csh)
-| wcel(c1, csh)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c2, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, co(c2, cph, c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, co(c2, cph, c1)))
-| wcel(c2, csh)
-| wcel(c1, csh)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c2, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, co(c2, cph, c1))))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c2, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, co(c2, cph, c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, co(c2, cph, c1)))
-| wcel(c2, csh)
-| wcel(c1, csh)

comment: A subspace sum contains a member of one of its subspaces. (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
